Container.Name: tmuxai
Container.Overview:
TmuxAI integrates AI capabilities directly into your tmux terminal sessions. Ask questions, get command suggestions, and interact with AI models (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) without leaving your terminal.
Features: - AI assistance in tmux sessions - Support for multiple AI providers - Easy configuration - Minimal resource usage
Container.Description:
TmuxAI brings AI assistance to your tmux terminal sessions on Unraid.
[b]Quick Setup:[/b] 1. Install the plugin 2. Run: bash /boot/config/plugins/tmuxai/setup.sh 3. Configure your AI provider API key 4. Start using tmuxai in your tmux sessions!
[b]Supported AI Providers:[/b] - OpenAI (GPT-3.5, GPT-4) - Anthropic (Claude) - Google (Gemini) - OpenAI-compatible APIs
[b]Usage:[/b] - Inside tmux: Press Ctrl+b then C (capital C) - Command line: tmuxai ask "your question"
[b]Documentation:[/b] See README.md in the repository for detailed setup and usage instructions.

Config.Name: API Key Configuration
Config.Description: Configure your AI provider API key in /boot/config/go or use the setup script
